mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE HH_USAGE_STORE ( USAGE_STORE_NO INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , CATEGORY_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , STORE TEXT(64) NOT NULL , FOREIGN KEY(CATEGORY_NO) REFERENCES HH_CATEGORY(NO) )
mapper.select: SELECT ST.USAGE_STORE_NO , ST.STORE , ST.CATEGORY_NO , CT.NAME FROM HH_USAGE_STORE ST INNER JOIN HH_CATEGORY CT ON ST.CATEGORY_NO = CT.NO ORDER BY ST.CATEGORY_NO, ST.STORE
SELECT CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS RES FROM HH_USAGE_STORE WHERE 1=1 AND STORE = #{name}
SELECT USAGE_STORE_NO , STORE , CATEGORY_NO FROM HH_USAGE_STORE WHERE STORE = #{name}
